rows.label: tlk43310191_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The Temperantia incident just
confirmed all my worst suspicions
about those accursed Superbians.

rows.label: tlk43310191_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I mean, they were secretly excavating
Judicium Divine Beast weaponry in the middle
of designated neutral territory!

rows.label: tlk43310191_03_msg0003
rows.name:
That Divine Beast weapon that wiped out
our forces stationed in Temperantia
was powerful to be sure...

rows.label: tlk43310191_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But did we really do the right thing
agreeing to Acedia's calls for a ceasefire?

rows.label: tlk43310191_03_msg0005
rows.name: Did those who fell perish for nothing?
